sense.gloss: to work hard, to keep one's nose to the grindstone, to whip a jaded horse
to make someone do what is beyond their ability

k_ele.e: 麒麟も老いぬれば駑馬に劣る
騏驎も老いぬれば駑馬に劣る

r_ele.r: きりんもおいぬればどばにおとる

sense.gloss: even an outstanding person becomes inferior when getting old

words.gloss: to work hard, to keep one's nose to the grindstone, to whip a jaded horse
